title: Topic 001 Question 020
body: You are deploying Microsoft Teams Calling Plans.
You port all phone numbers to Microsoft Teams Phone as shown in the exhibit. (Click the Exhibit tab.)
You need to assign the number +1-234-555-5334 to an auto attendant.
options: Open a Microsoft support case to initiate an inventory type change.
Create a port order for a user number.
Assign the number to the resource account of the auto attendant.
Get an auto attendant toll number.
